summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Trail France application - French trail running platform with race management, user authentication, favorites system, and admin moderation. Backend APIs and frontend integration working excellently.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 405 Method Not Allowed instead of 200
minor_bugs.impact: Seed endpoint not accessible via POST, but database is already seeded

passed_tests: Race CRUD operations and filtering (region, UTMB, distance, search)
Home page hero section and featured races
Race list page with filters and search
Race detail pages with favorite functionality
Admin panel access and moderation interface
Integration between frontend and backend APIs
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Seed endpoint returns 405 instead of 200, but this doesn't affect functionality as database is already properly seeded. SendGrid email notifications are MOCKED as expected (no API key configured).
